divs: Sighting DetailsWe saw this disc came out of the west it made a very hard right turn and headed into the north. I have never seen a plane to turn this fast and was going faster than a plane could.The disc was a solid bright light with a bright very fast strobing light.
Summary: Disc Lit whole craft with strobing light very fast
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in McDonough
There were no other sightings in McDonough on or around October 17th 2012
